column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our server was so friendly. And if I stopped right there
column2: I'd rate this review a four star. The circulation of this restaurant is horrible. Our waters were only filled once during the beginning and once during the end. It took awhile for our server to give us our check and even longer to give it back. I watched our server take our check
column5: then finally returned with our check. The table next to us sat down before us and waited longer than us to get their check. It's busy
column6: I get that. But for a popular restaurant
column7: there should be more of a flow.
